column4: dudes don't send me this... I know that Ubuntu can be installed in a lot of ways
I CAN"T install via USB
the Server edition
notice - Server
why ?
define "dies"
second reboot ??? there should only be one reboot, install then reboot
how far does it get to boot before it complains
it's not a design flaw
it's user error
nonsense, but that's not for this channel
you ever installed from usb the server?
they didn't, it sounds like you've not got the process
never done a server install, but done the desktop many times, and it's the same thing
double check the steps in the link ubottu has sent you
double check the steps in the link ubottu has sent you
why is that funny, have you checked the URL that ubottu sent you
it walks you through the process
the desktop and server install are the same process
you move the file systems to the usb stick and it boots them
try listening and reading, the process is the same
the image you use will be different but the process is the same
please stop ok
drop the attitude now
